title: Nintendo: No Plans For Switch Pro - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.19.21
description:
Janet and Tim breakdown the latest statements from Nintendo, Skate 4's teaser, Ratchet and Clank's design choices, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:35 - Housekeeping
MCU In Review Returns today as the boys rank Loki the series against all the MCU movies and shows. Catch it live on Patreon.com/kindafunny or tomorrow on youtube.com/kindafunny and podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:00 -  Nintendo Says It Has No Plans to Release Another Switch Model Right Now
00:14:10 - Steam Deck: Valve Is Doing its Best to Avoid Thumbstick Drift
00:19:40 - Ratchet and Clank’s modernization meant making it easier
00:33:23 - Skate Will Not be at EA Play but Here is a Teaser
00:47:10 - New Tom Clancy Incoming
00:53:30 - Out today
00:55:16 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
